original_text: King Solomon also built ships at Ezion Geber, which is near Elath in Edom, on the shore of the Red Sea.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 에돔 땅 홍해 물 가의 엘롯 근처 에시온게벨에서 배들을 지은지라

sentences.original_text: King Solomon also built ships at Ezion Geber
which is near Elath in Edom
on the shore of the Red Sea
